pages.text: Finally! The alloy I was speculating about was gold and $(l:divinity)divinity$(), and with 3 $(l:crown_shards)Crown Shards$(), I can create the $(l:chipped_crown)Chipped Crown$(). $(br2)By placing 3 $(l:crowned_gems)Crowned Gems$() into the $(l:chipped_crown)Chipped Crown$(), it is resored to its former glory as the $(l)Crown of False Kings$()!
